original_title: Debt restructuring must be fair; Namal calls for explanation
original_body_lines: MP Namal Rajapaksa said that the debt restructuring must be implemented in a fair manner, adding that these decisions must be explained to the public.
"It cannot be restructured for just one group,” he said addressing a meeting in Hiniduma.
Namal Rajapaksa also said that the reasons for restructuring should also be explained to the public.
